messages.subject: Pensacola SCA....
messages.msgSnippet: Michelle and Ren.... Thank you both for the input,it s greatly appreciated.  We do not often go the NE side of town but my husband says that the past few times
messages.messageBody:
Michelle and Ren....

Thank you both for the input,it's greatly appreciated. We do not
often go the NE side of town but my husband says that the past few
times he's seen them that that is what is done each time. None of the
women or children were dressed up although a couple of boys had on
knight type gear, however, there were quiet a few men dressed up as
knights. Is that pretty much it for the Pensacola chapter?

~Respectfully, Sandy

BTW...I completely understand that this is a WONDERFUL organization
and didn't take your comments Michelle, as a slam on the SCA,
afterall, you said how great it was elsewhere. Thank you for your
invite to seek more information, I'll let Zak know that that's pretty
much it and see if he's still interested. He hasn't spoken about it
at all since Sunday, may have just been a fleeting thought.
